subject: Psychology
title: Sleep as Medicine
description: A fast breakdown of Sleep as Medicine for builders.

hook.text: No pill matches what sleep does for your brain, heart, immune system, and mood. Sleep is the best medicine we ignore.

buildup.text: Sleep regulates nearly every biological system: immunity, metabolism, cardiovascular health, and mental well-being.

discovery.text: Matthew Walker's research shows that sleep is the single most effective thing you can do for brain and body health.

twist.text: Despite the evidence, sleep is rarely prescribed by doctors. It's the only health behavior sacrificed without guilt.

climax.text: Prioritizing sleep isn't laziness. It's the most evidence-based health decision you can make every single day.

punchline.text: Sleep isn't the enemy of productivity. It's the foundation.

quiz.question: What did Matthew Walker's research conclude about sleep?
options: Sleep is the most effective thing for brain and body health
Sleep is less important than diet and exercise
Six hours of sleep is optimal for adults
